nodes.text: Droid Security Systems (DSS) was a division of Sacul Industries Group. The company provided security droids used by a number of travel agencies, including the improved IM series and G2 repair droids.

This organization was mentioned only in an advertisement on the video screen found exclusively in the queue of Star Tours: The Adventures Continue at Tokyo Disneyland. Since the G2-series droids advertised are already established as products of other companies, DSS likely only provided these droids to companies. The IM-series droids, however, were most likely created by them.
